definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 朝鮮中央通訊社|朝鲜中央通讯社[Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4]

sentences.english: Finally, all civil and military officials in the court held high wine glasses to congratulate on Emperor Xuanzong birthday.
sentences.chinese: 最後朝中文武百官高舉酒杯齊聲爲玄宗祝壽。

sentences.english: Nowadays, in some countries, still usually a friend in court is better than much pound in purse.
sentences.chinese: 今天，在許多國家，通常朝中有友，勝過囊中好多錢。

sentences.english: The DPRK-China Friendship Year has effectively boosted the friendship and trust between the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 朝中友好年活動有力地促進了兩國人民的友誼和信任。

sentences.english: Much of Close Friends in the Royal Court by Yu Xinzhong is poems with drawings.
sentences.chinese: 於興宗“朝中知友”的唱和詩大部分都屬於題畫詩。

sentences.english: It is the resolve of the DPRK party and government to consolidate and promote this friendship.
sentences.chinese: 鞏固和發展朝中友誼是朝鮮黨和政府的堅定意志。

sentences.english: Pak said that the two countries are close neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 朴鳳柱說，朝中兩國是親密鄰邦。

sentences.english: He said the DPRK side would work with the Chinese side to push forward DPRK-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 朝方願與中方共同努力，推動朝中關係不斷向前發展。

sentences.english: Pak indicated it is a firm policy for the DPRK to carry on and develop DPRK-China friendship.
sentences.chinese: 朴鳳柱表示，繼承和發展朝中友誼是朝方堅定的政策。

definition: all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
